author: astitcher
msg: Stop the client side Rdma code from receiving connection events before the data events
are stopped to avoid any events after the Rdma::Connector is deleted

author: astitcher
msg: Delay client side Rdma connection disconnect() so that it happens serialised
to the data channel for the connection.

author: astitcher
msg: Delay daemon side Rdma connection disconnect() so that it happens serialised
to the data channel for the connection.

author: astitcher
msg: Avoid Rdma::AsynchIO leaking when stopped without being drained and
add in asserts to be sure that you call stopped and drained callbacks

author: astitcher
msg: Only delete Rdma server side connections when the client disconnects -
this avoids a race between the disconnect event and deleting the connection
